overall_score.par: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field
5+ years of hands-on experience in backend development

Familiarity with event-driven architectures (Kafka, RabbitMQ, or Pub/Sub)

Led a team of developers or mentored junior engineers
Performance recognition such as awards or patents
AWS Certified Solutions Architect or relevant cloud certification
